name: Explorer Kit
description: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground.

name: Loot Sack
description: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine.

name: Rule Book
description: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use.

name: Poké Radar
description: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.

name: Point Card
description: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned.

name: Journal
description: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far.

name: Seal Case
description: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the capsule cases of Poké Balls.

name: Fashion Case
description: A lovely case to store colorful Props for your Pokémon to wear in a musical.

name: Seal Bag
description: A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for decorating Poké Balls.

name: Pal Pad
description: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends, Friend Codes, and keeping a record of game play.

name: Works Key
description: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

name: Old Charm
description: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.

name: Galactic Key
description: A card key for disengaging security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.

name: Red Chain
description: A mythical chain that is said to link the legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.

name: Town Map
description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.

name: Vs. Seeker
description: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.

name: Coin Case
description: A case for holding Coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 Coins.

name: Old Rod
description: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
description: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Sprayduck
description: A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.

name: Poffin Case
description: A case for storing Poffin cooked from Berries.

name: Suite Key
description: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.

name: Oak's Letter
description: A letter from Prof. Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Rt. 224.

name: Lunar Wing
description: A feather that glows like the moon. It is said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.

name: Member Card
description: A card needed for entering the inn in Canalave City. Oddly, the last date marked on it was 50 years ago.

name: Azure Flute
description: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. It is unknown who made it.

name: Contest Pass
description: The pass required for entering POKéMON CONTESTS. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.

name: Magma Stone
description: A stone formed when boulders melted in intensely hot magma, then hardened. Magma remains sealed inside.

name: Coupon 1
description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 2
description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 3
description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

name: Secret Potion
description: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

name: Vs. Recorder
description: An amazing device that can record a battle either between friends or at a special battle facility.

name: Gracidea
description: A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets to convey gratitude on special occasions like birthdays.

name: Apricorn Box
description: A handy box where you can store up to 99 Apricorns of each kind.

name: Unown Report
description: A report of all the discovered kinds of UNOWN.

name: Berry Pots
description: Handy containers for cultivating Berries wherever you go.

name: Dowsing Machine
description: Searches for hidden items on the ground.

name: Blue Card
description: A card to save points for the Buena's Password show.

name: Slowpoke Tail
description: A very tasty tail of something. It sells for a high price.

name: Clear Bell
description: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.

name: Squirt Bottle
description: A bottle used for watering plants in the Berry Pots.

name: Red Scale
description: A scale from the red GYARADOS. It glows red like a flame.

name: Lost Item
description: The Mime Jr. doll that was lost by the Copycat.

name: Pass
description: A ticket required for riding the Magnet Train. It allows you to ride whenever and however much you'd like.

name: Machine Part
description: An important machine part for the Power Plant that was stolen.

name: Silver Wing
description: A strange, silvery feather that sparkles.

name: Rainbow Wing
description: A mystical rainbow feather that sparkles.

name: Mystery Egg
description: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What's in the Egg is unknown.

name: Red Apricorn
description: A red Apricorn. It assails your nostrils.

name: Blue Apricorn
description: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.

name: Yellow Apricorn
description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.

name: Green Apricorn
description: A green Apricorn. It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.

name: Pink Apricorn
description: A pink Apricorn. It has a nice, sweet scent.

name: White Apricorn
description: A white Apricorn. It doesn't smell like anything.

name: Black Apricorn
description: A black Apricorn It has an indescribable scent.

name: Fast Ball
description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon which are quick to run away.

name: Level Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.

name: Lure Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

name: Heavy Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.

name: Love Ball
description: Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

name: Friend Ball
description: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.

name: Moon Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

name: Sport Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

name: Park Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

name: Photo Album
description: A nice photo album for storing all the photos taken along your adventure.

name: GB Sounds
description: A music player that allows you to listen to nostalgic songs. It's operated with a single switch.

name: Tidal Bell
description: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.

name: Rage Candy Bar
description: Heals all major status conditions.

name: Data Card 01
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many victories you've had.

name: Data Card 02
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many losses you've had.

name: Data Card 03
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have dashed.

name: Data Card 04
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have jumped.

name: Data Card 05
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won the Hurdle Dash.

name: Data Card 06
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won the Relay Run.

name: Data Card 07
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Pennant Capture.

name: Data Card 08
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Block Smash.

name: Data Card 09
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Disc Catch.

name: Data Card 10
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Snow Throw.

name: Data Card 11
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many points your Pokémon scored.

name: Data Card 12
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have failed.

name: Data Card 13
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon impeded themselves.

name: Data Card 14
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have tackled.

name: Data Card 15
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have fallen down.

name: Data Card 16
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Ring Drop.

name: Data Card 17
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Lamp Jump.

name: Data Card 18
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Circle Push.

name: Data Card 19
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon wins you've had.

name: Data Card 20
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon losses you've had.

name: Data Card 21
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won an event.

name: Data Card 22
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've lost an event.

name: Data Card 23
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've switched Pokémon.

name: Data Card 24
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Goal Roll.

name: Data Card 25
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon won individual prizes.

name: Data Card 26
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've instructed your Pokémon.

name: Data Card 27
description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how much time you've spent in the Pokéathlon.

name: Jade Orb
description: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend and has a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

name: Lock Capsule
description: A sturdy Capsule that can only be opened with a special key.

name: Red Orb
description: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend and has a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

name: Blue Orb
description: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend and has a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

name: Enigma Stone
description: A crystal ball that was excavated from the ground. A very beautiful stone that is covered with bits of rock and earth.

name: Eviolite
description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

name: Float Stone
description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

name: Rocky Helmet
description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

name: Air Balloon
description: When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.

name: Red Card
description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.

name: Ring Target
description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.

name: Binding Band
description: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.

name: Absorb Bulb
description: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.

name: Cell Battery
description: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

name: Eject Button
description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.

name: Fire Gem
description: Increases the power of a Fire-type move only once.

name: Water Gem
description: Increases the power of a Water-type move only once.

name: Electric Gem
description: Increases the power of an Electric-type move only once.

name: Grass Gem
description: Increases the power of a Grass-type move only once.

name: Ice Gem
description: Increases the power of an Ice-type move only once.

name: Fighting Gem
description: Increases the power of a Fighting-type move only once.

name: Poison Gem
description: Increases the power of a Poison-type move only once.

name: Ground Gem
description: Increases the power of a Ground-type move only once.

name: Flying Gem
description: Increases the power of a Flying-type move only once.

name: Psychic Gem
description: Increases the power of a Psychic-type move only once.

name: Rock Gem
description: Increases the power of a Rock-type move only once.

name: Ghost Gem
description: Increases the power of a Ghost-type move only once.

name: Dragon Gem
description: Increases the power of a Dragon-type move only once.

name: Dark Gem
description: Increases the power of a Dark-type move only once.

name: Steel Gem
description: Increases the power of a Steel-type move only once.

name: Normal Gem
description: Increases the power of a Normal-type move only once.

name: Cover Fossil
description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.

name: Plume Fossil
description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that flew in the sky in ancient times. It appears to be part of its wing.

name: Liberty Pass
description: A special pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.

name: Pass Orb
description: A mysterious orb containing the power of the Unova region, to be used when generating Pass Power.

name: Dream Ball
description: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

name: Poké Toy
description: An item that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

name: Prop Case
description: A lovely case to store colorful Props for your Pokémon to wear in a musical.

name: Dragon Skull
description: A skull of a Pokémon which was said to have braved the angry waters to fly around the world.

name: Balm Mushroom
description: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Big Nugget
description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Pearl String
description: Very large pearls that sparkle in a pretty silver color. A maniac will buy them for a high price.

name: Comet Shard
description: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Copper
description: A copper coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Silver
description: A silver coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Gold
description: A gold coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Vase
description: A vase made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Band
description: A bracelet made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Statue
description: A stone figure made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Relic Crown
description: A crown made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Casteliacone
description: Heals all major status conditions.

name: Dire Hit 2
description: Raises a Pokémon's critical-hit ratio in battle.

name: X Speed 2
description: Sharply raises Speed of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Sp. Atk 2
description: Sharply raises Special Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Sp. Def 2
description: Sharply raises Special Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Defense 2
description: Sharply raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Attack 2
description: Sharply raises Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Accuracy 2
description: Sharply raises Accuracy of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Speed 3
description: Drastically raises Speed of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Sp. Atk 3
description: Drastically raises Special Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Sp. Def 3
description: Drastically raises Special Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Defense 3
description: Drastically raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Attack 3
description: Drastically raises Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Accuracy 3
description: Drastically raises Accuracy of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Speed 6
description: Immensely raises Speed of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Sp. Def 6
description: Immensely raises Special Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Defense 6
description: Immensely raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Attack 6
description: Immensely raises Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

name: X Accuracy 6
description: Immensely raises Accuracy of a Pokémon in battle.

name: Ability Urge
description: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokémon.

name: Item Drop
description: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to drop a held item.

name: Item Urge
description: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to use its held item.

name: Reset Urge
description: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokémon.

name: Dire Hit 3
description: Greatly raises a Pokémon's critical-hit ratio in battle.

name: Light Stone
description: Reshiram's body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.

name: Dark Stone
description: Zekrom's body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.

name: TM93
description: Teaches the move Wild Charge.

name: TM94
description: Teaches the move Rock Smash/Surf.

name: TM95
description: Teaches the move Snarl.

name: Gram 1
description: An important letter which Wingull delivers.

name: Gram 2
description: An important letter which Wingull delivers.

name: Gram 3
description: An important letter which Wingull delivers.

name: Xtransceiver
description: A high-tech transceiver with a camera function. It allows up to four-way calls.

name: Medal Box
description: A box-shaped machine that stores Medals and Medal information.

name: DNA Splicers
description: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.

name: Permit
description: A permit that is needed to enter the Nature Preserve. Not many know about it.

name: Oval Charm
description: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Pokémon Eggs being found at the Day Care.

name: Shiny Charm
description: A shiny charm said to increase the chance of finding a Shiny Pokémon in the wild.

name: Plasma Card
description: A card key needed to enter the password inside the Plasma Frigate.

name: Grubby Hanky
description: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.

name: Colress Machine
description: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It is an imperfect prototype.

name: Dropped Item
description: The Xtransceiver found at the Nimbasa City amusement park. It seems it belongs to a boy.

name: Reveal Glass
description: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It's a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.

name: Weakness Policy
description: Sharply raises Attack and Special Attack if hit by a super-effective move.

name: Assault Vest
description: Raises Special Defense but prevents the use of status moves.

name: Prof's Letter
description: A letter that Professor Sycamore wrote to your mother. A faint but pleasant perfume seems to cling to the paper.

name: Roller Skates
description: Attaches roller skates to the bottom of your shoes, allowing you to glide quickly around and perform tricks.

name: Pixie Plate
description: Increases power of Fairy-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Fairy.

name: Ability Capsule
description: A capsule that allows a Pokémon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

name: Whipped Dream
description: Evolves Swirlix when traded holding the item.

name: Sachet
description: Evolves Spritzee when traded holding the item.

name: Luminous Moss
description: Raises Special Defense if hit by a Water-type move.

name: Snowball
description: Raises Attack if hit by an Ice-type move.

name: Safety Goggles
description: Prevents damage from weather and powder.

name: Poké Flute
description: A flute that is said to instantly awaken any POKéMON. It has a lovely tone.

name: Rich Mulch
description: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It increases the Berry harvest without the need for particularly diligent care.

name: Surprise Mulch
description: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It causes strange, sudden mutations based on the combination of Berries.

name: Boost Mulch
description: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It increases the Berry harvest that can be grown by diligent watering.

name: Amaze Mulch
description: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. An amazing Mulch with the effects of Rich, Surprise, and Boost Mulch.

name: Gengarite
description: Enables Gengar to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Gardevoirite
description: Enables Gardevoir to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Ampharosite
description: Enables Ampharos to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Venusaurite
description: Enables Venusaur to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Charizardite X
description: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Blastoisinite
description: Enables Blastoise to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Mewtwonite X
description: Enables Mewtwo to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Mewtwonite Y
description: Enables Mewtwo to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Blazikenite
description: Enables Blaziken to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Medichamite
description: Enables Medicham to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Houndoominite
description: Enables Houndoom to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Aggronite
description: Enables Aggron to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Jolly Mint
description: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Jolly nature.

name: Naive Mint
description: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Naive nature.

name: Serious Mint
description: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match a neutral nature.

name: Wishing Piece
description: Activates a Pokémon Den for a Max Raid Battle.

name: Cracked Pot
description: Evolves Sinistea into Polteageist.

name: Chipped Pot
description: Evolves Sinistea into Polteageist.

name: Hi-tech Earbuds
description: Strange earbuds that allow you to freely control the volume of various sounds.

name: Fruit Bunch
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The syrupy fruits give off a strong tropical feel.

name: Moomoo Cheese
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Melted cheese can really give a curry some richness.

name: Spice Mix
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. There are over fifty spices contained within this ingredient’s hot flavor.

name: Fresh Cream
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Add some whipped cream to a spicy curry to give it some sweetness.

name: Packaged Curry
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Using packaged curry helps make sure there are no slipups when cooking.

name: Coconut Milk
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The refined sweetness of this coconut milk makes it quite popular.

name: Instant Noodles
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. It has a junk-food sort of taste, but it goes well with curry.

name: Precooked Burger
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. If you’re unsure about what to cook, you can’t go wrong with some burger.

name: Gigantamix
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. A mysterious spice. Even a tiny sprinkle is sure to make a curry gigantic.

name: Wishing Chip
description: Toss a number of them into a Pokémon Den for the chance to attract a wild Dynamax Pokémon.

name: Rotom Bike
description: This bike can be combined with the Pokémon Rotom to not only do a turbo boost but also run on the water.

name: Catching Charm
description: Holding it is said to increase the chance of getting a critical catch. Curiously, the charm doesn’t shake much.

name: Old Letter
description: A letter entrusted to you by a girl, to be delivered to a boy. Strangely, it looks old to you.

name: Band Autograph
description: It’s signed by all members of the Galar region’s most charismatic band, the Maximizers.

name: Sonia's Book
description: Professor Sonia’s published writings. Her new discoveries about the Galar region’s legends are recorded in this enjoyable read.

name: Rotom Catalog
description: A catalog of devices that Rotom like. Use the catalog to have Rotom hop in and out of the various devices listed within.

name: Prism Scale
description: Evolves Feebas when traded holding the item.

name: Berserk Gene
description: Permanetly confuses the holder and raises its Attack by 2 stages as soon as it enters battle. It is consumed upon use.
